Review text: Low-level service. Not recommended to order or let them handle your shipment. No one there knows how to provide clear answers or proper explanations without creating even more questions. They charge unreasonable fees and amounts without actually explaining what the payment is for. The payment process feels unsafe, and the shipment is not organized. They demand additional charges without prior notice or informing the customer. On top of that, the delivery itself is completely unorganized. The courier calls whenever he feels like it, without scheduling in advance, even though the customer is available and ready to pay. Without extra payment, the package is not delivered, and rescheduling the delivery becomes a huge and exhausting procedure. I will never order from or deal with FedEx again, and I strongly recommend everyone to stay away from them as a shipping company.

I contacted FedEx Denmark to request an export price correction, but the staff was extremely cold and unhelpful. Instead of assisting with the amendment process, they just gave me the runaround and told me to "ask Customs." As a major carrier, they should take responsibility for their documentation errors or at least guide the customer. Disappointing experience.

Absolutely garbage service. Package has had status out for delivery for more than 2 days and the customer service phone number routes you to just telling you it's out for delivery and that's all the information they have and hang up on you. The only way to get a real person is to say "something else", "tech support", "something else" and then that person will just tell you the same thing. Zero accountability, zero customer service, horrible organization. Will go out of my way to avoid FedEx whenever possible in the future.

This is the complete worst company ever first and last time. I had the most wordt experience with you ever. Ill never use fed ex again. Know wonder why it has a one star review says it all. Im a straight up honest person i call them as i see them. Worst experience. They say there delivering Sunday this time it don't happen have to be home to sign, then they say monday this time it dont happen either. They play games with people's minds. Well im an adult not a child play head games with someone else. My time is valuable. Can't fix stupid medicate it. There say there in this area Hunker not far from me yet cant give a time and keep lieing on a delivery time. Im sick of it. Here is a piece of advice treat people the way you want to be treated. Stop treating ur customers bad then they will leave you a good review.
The worst shipping and customer lack of service.

Drivers are thieves. Last year I ordered a brahmins hand bags the fex driver delivered it at the wrong place this was the first time. it was ,$300.00. The second time I ordered a Motorola razor phone and the driver Left fit at the front that's on the floor at my senior citizen but. I did get it $599.00. Now this is the third time I ordered some pajamas They took it to a bank PNC instead of the post office and let someone else sign for my package $50.00 this to This is too many times that the drivers has done this. When are you going to investigate and realize that those drivers need to go? Somebody is stealing.

They steal items. I was told by the people I ordered my phone from which is best buy that Fedex workers are the ones keep stealing my phone. This has happened twice. They cut open the bottom of the box and put clear tape on where they opened it up. Always look for the clear tape over the brown seal tape usually at the bottom of the box.

So many lies. I’ve never had to deal with so many lies they keep telling me about why my package hasn’t been delivered and they say they don’t know the location is on a map. I’ve talked too so many people about my lost driver and package it’s unbelievable. They keep telling me every day for four days before I hang up that I will get my package by the end of the day.

How do you guys stay in business. The last 5 packages from you guys are always 3 to 7 days later than the day you say it will be delivered. You tracking shows it on the truck and out for delivery and then at 9 PM at night, status is updated with various excuses. Weather, shipping problems, problem with delivery, and others. I NEVER use fedex and if a company uses you I request different carrier or shop elsewhere. Just say your motto is: "WE don't care, we are always late, deal with it, if you don't like it, tough there is nothing you can do about it." smh

What the hell
My mom had been waiting for my package for FOUR HOURS, just for them to deem that no one was home. They DIDNT EVEN KNOCK ON THE DOOR!! Sorry I'm really frustrated that I've had to postpone my package so many times to be able to receive it, just for it to not be delivered. I still haven't received it :(

I contacted FedEx Denmark to request an export price correction, but the staff was extremely cold and unhelpful. Instead of assisting with the amendment process, they just gave me the runaround and told me to "ask Customs." As a major carrier, they should take responsibility for their documentation errors or at least guide the customer. Disappointing experience.

Don't ship with FEDEX
Don't ship with FEDEX - the post office is more reliable. My international package was to be delivered in 4 days. I shipped the Monday, from Bronx, New York to Kingston, Jamaica. It spent 49 hours in Miami - unacceptable. It reached Jamaica on Friday evening. The delivery date was updated on the website from Thursday, January 29th to Monday, February 2. The package spent another day at a local FEDEX shipment centre which was less than 2 miles away from the shipment centre where I had shipped with instructions for it to be held there for the receiver to pick up. When I noticed that the package was not moving, I called to ask FEDEX if the package could be held at the location where it was stuck - and they said they could not guarantee that. To my dismay, they updated the delivery date again to the Wednesday. The telephone number of my recipient was on the package - no one thought to call. Why would they try to hold my package for an additional 2 days when it was less than 2 miles away from their own FEDEX centre where it was to be collected? I asked the recipient to present himself to the location with his ID, and that is how the package was received. The package could have been collected a day earlier if only FEDEX representatives were caring. I kept telling them the distance between where the package was and the destination address (which they should have known because both are FEDEX facilities). The recipient could have collected the package at least a day earlier. FEDEX did not care.

I now am trying to file a claim to get back at least a part of my money; however, FEDEX requires that I open an account with them and provide my banking details. I do not want to put my banking information out there. After all that transpired, I do not trust FEDEX. This requirement to file a claim by requesting your banking information seems to be a way of deterring customers from filing claim. I can't imagine many people wanting to provide their banking information given the circumstances. This is definitely a calculated decision on FEDEX' part to do this to dissuade customers from going through the process. Why is my banking information needed to file a claim? All that is necessary should be my name, address, tracking number, details of what transpired - which FEDEX has access to. It is all there on their website, FEDEX should mail me a check for the inconvenience and unprofessional service they provided. My package took more than twice the amount of time promised to be delivered - instead of 4 days, it took 9 days. Had I not intervened, the package would have taken 11 days to reach the recipient. Surely, the post office would have delivered sooner. I should not have to pay for express delivery for this slow service.

Awesome employee experience
The employee who delivered my moms package today went above and beyond, there was snow on the ground and on the porch so he knocked on the door to hand deliver the item so it didn’t get wet! I’m am very impressed and thankful for his kindness

Worst customer service
We tried to contact fed ex multiple times due to it said we received all 3 packages for building a shed. We left multiple messages and never received a call back. We called again last night sat on hold to speak with someone and when we finally got someone she told us we needed to contact the sending company and the need to file a claim. I told her we had already spoke with them and they said weneeded to speak with fed ex. We tracked down our missing package and someone signed for it in another state. I told her I wanted to speak with a supervisor and she said that wasn't an option. We still haven't resolved our problem because nobody will help us. Fed ex has been a huge let down and I wanted to share the horrible customer service we received!
Every time I pay for second day my packages get lost, very frustrating dealing with fedex!

If I could 0 stars I would. Had a package to come, was not home and was left a door tag. Called and requested it be pulled off the truck so I could come into location and sign. I was told, after spending 45 minutes for girl to complete, that she would schedule delivery between 4:30 and 8:30, and someone would call to confirm. LIES LIES LIES. nope got another door tag, called and was told this could not be done, and they would make delivery tomorrow, despite me repeatedly stating no one would be here.
WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER. WOULD NEVER SEND A PACKAGE WITH THEM, EVER!!!!!

Delayed Package/Rude Customer Service
I had ordered my item on January 26, 2026 on Wayfair. It is understandable that inclement weather had created a delay with the shipping. However, it is now February 3, 2026. When I follow-up on the tracking with Fed Ex, the website would provide me with misinformation. Fed Ex would mention a delivery on the day of me checking the tracking. Subsequently, it would then inform me that the packages would be delivered the next day. At this point, I’ve been experiencing this delay for close to - if not - over a week. I can recount calling Fed Ex. Due to my back issues, I had called Fed Ex to request that they deliver the package directly to my apartment- with the assistance of the leasing consultants to bring the packages inside my unit or at the front door. One agent just reiterated the tracking like a robot, and before I could speak, she transferred me to the automated review line. I called again, as the male agent started with his scripted speaking points for my information, I had interjected to make him aware for the purpose of my call, he then immediately transfers me to the automated review line. Upon the third call, the agent was extremely helpful. However, despite requesting packages be delivered to my front door, the Fed Ex delivery driver placed one of my packages in the Luxer Storage Room at my apartment building. That particular package was ordered after the aforementioned packages that I am still waiting for delivery. I don’t know what’s going on with Fed Ex, but they have really disappointed me.

Do not touch this company if you are a collector and value your prised items.
We haven't received a delivery in over a week and no tracking update.
Poor service, would never recommend them to anyone in the collector fraternity

Well fedex are appalling 2 days running parcel should have arrived no it dident looked at tracking it was in Newcastle then went to Stansted’ what a joke had a call from fedex said they don’t have my. House number what is going on Iv tried to cancel this parcel it’s paint for gods sake probably thrown everywhere I ordered from Argos so that won’t be happening again utter shambles of a firm

One of the worst services I have ever experienced.
My shipment has been stuck for more than a month.
Neither the dispatcher nor the receiver has any status updates.
Whenever I call, the only reply I get is that they don’t have any information.
My humble request: please do not ship your valuable items with this irresponsible company. They are not reliable.
My AWB number is-424602959872
Nobody knows where is my shipment

FedEx is the "Temu of all delivery services"
Had I known that my $1000+ order with WebRestaurant was going to be sent via Fed Ex I would have ordered from somewhere else!

FedEx Home Delivery should be renamed Temu FedEx. It's the ultra budget, "we don't care about your business"delivery.

I ordered expensive commercial kitchen equipment worth over $1200 that split into 4 shipments. Fed Ex promised that it would be delivered by Carlos.
You can even play pretend with them feeling like you're really tracking your driver's deliveries. It's just the same game with them.
Fed Ex pretends that is going to ship on a stated date, then gives you a time in the afternoon. Then it pushed it up 3 hours earlier. I track it on the app and see that it's in my neighborhood... Says it will be to me by 1:30.
Then suddenly the truck disappears off my map and says it will be delivered by the end of business.
They've pulled this trick with me so many times that I'm done with them.
They used to be a great reliable company. The gold standard. I used them to ship myself and also to receive.
The USPS is ten times better.
UPS is 50/50
Fed Ex is the absolute worst.

Package from US to EU stuck in customs, did not inform us, then did not respond to our emails and then charged us for storage, They turned up at the door and wanted 300 euros EXTRA, for customs clearance and storage on samples worth 500 euros. How do people do business with this company. We rejected the Package, business lost for US company.

Terrible service. If I could give less than a 1 I would. Been waiting on an overnight package for 5 days that has been out for delivery for 2. I understand weather was an issue, but the roads have been clear for days. It is a very important package, they should be ashamed.

Tired of delayed packages for no reason
At 9:32 am on 2/5/26I received a message that James from Fedex had my walmart.com order and it was to be delivered that day. It was only 45 minutes from my house. At 1:32pm I received a text that said it was going to be delayed due to weather and would be delivered the next day. Here's the thing, there was no weather! However this morning, 2/6/26 we now have bad weather and I received another message that it is delayed. I understand why it was delayed today but why didn't I receive it yesterday??? There have been several times I would get a notice that it was delivered when it wasn't and because I complained they delivered for a period of time to Dollar Feneral and I had to go after them!

Poor excuse of a shipper!
FexEx is the sorriest shipper that ever existed.

Constant delays, inconsistent customer support
Called to check on a package that they said they had the wrong address for. The first time they verified my name and said the address was wrong. They said they fixed it. The second time it was delayed they said the aslddress was wrong and they were not allowed to fix it. But after hearing my frustration they were going to fix it. The third day it was delayed I called and they said my name didn't match. This company is trash and I will never use them for anything I personally mail

My package very late
My package is over a week late & I can't contact anyone to assist me nor will they return my call. My medication is very important & I am having to go without my meds at this point!!!

my recent experience with FedEx is indescribably bad. I cannot adequately express the frustration and aggravation that I got from FedEx. It is amazing how bad this company has gotten from something that was so admired.

Pedantic and chaotic customs clearing procedure
Pedantic customs clearing: First day asked for a screen shot of the order, despite having an invoice. Next day asked for all my tax details, third day asked for dimension without saying whether it was the parcel or content that was meant. Fourth day asked for a packing list. Now wondering what information is more needed to do their job. Parcel will have taken almost 4 weeks to be delivered. Most unimpressed.

My package was left on the ground at my mailbox that is about 500 ft from my house. There has never been any reason why the FEDEX drivers have been unable to leave my packages on my porch and I don't know why they did that. I live in a subdivision and anyone driving or walking by could have stolen it because no one was home when it was delivered and they don't send you the delivered confirmation message right away. I was lucky enough to have a relative go by and get it for me since I was at work. Do better FEDEX!

Ordered 3 packages on January 23rd 2026, 2 came via Amazon, the other 2 are USPS and have yet to arrive. One package has not moved at all in days, it sits about 18 miles away from me. This package is currently 3 days later than an already adjusted date. Another had no tracking info for days, just a "in transit" statement. It now sits about 45 miles away and has not moved in 4 days. Tracking now claims it will arrive today, but the mail has already run. In 1995, my Grandma could get a letter to me on time or early, despite being 14,000 miles away. In 2026, USPS can't manage to deliver a letter/package 20 miles.

Everytime I order something through Amazon and they end up using USPS, my packages either are lost in transit or delivered 2 weeks late. 3/4 of the time they are lost. I've had to cancel orders cause of this issue. Unacceptable... UPS, FEDEX, and Amazon take more pride in their delivery than USPS.
They glitched on a label I was trying to create and then glitched when I tried to get my refund. I'm cutting my losses and going to a physical Post Office because their website sucks.

Never got my package yesterday but yet it is marked as "delivered". I sat here all day yesterday, doorbell never rang! I'm sitting here at home, once again, missing my doctor appt., to see if this package arrives. Whoever hires them for their courier service are going to lose business, because it appears they just don't care these days when it comes to accurate deliveries. How is a package delivered and usps never even bother to tap my doorbell? I would know at that time to run down to the lobby, since I was expecting a package. Did usps employee actually deliver package vs never delivered because when I saw delivered, I ran down to the lobby and never received my package, not even the next day. When I inquired with usps online regarding missing package, they merely sent me a screenshot of package delivered. I understand it may not be the employees responsibility to stand in lobbies and talk over intercoms, just tap bell and keep it moving, it's not difficult.

I've been waiting for a specialized tool I need to complete a job on a customers engine. The expected delivery date was Saturday 1-31-26. I continuously checked the tracking number and noticed it showed it arrived at LOUISVILLE KY DISTRIBUTION CENTER but never showed departed. every day for 5 days the tracking number showed on its way to the next destination over and over when in fact it was just sitting there at LOUISVILLE KY DISTRIBUTION CENTER. now finally it shows it departed today on 2-2-26. so now I have to wait another week to get my package. ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!

I sent the package on December 13th, and it was supposed to arrive at its destination in a week. Three weeks have passed and I don't know where the box is. Very poor service, completely unreliable. It's a shame I can't send it through Amazon.

The package was scanned as delivered but was not received at my address. I checked my mailbox and the cluster mailbox units, and the package was not present. I spoke directly with the USPS carrier for my route, who checked the mailbox unit and delivery vehicle and confirmed the package was not there. The carrier stated the item may have been scanned as delivered in error or could still be at the post office, and that he would look for it and attempt delivery if found. I submit a service request to document the issue and request assistance from the local post office.

CM243909638US A 0 rating service, this courier company didn't even want to take the package off the plane when it arrived in Bucharest, in 2 hours it was back in Germany. The package label doesn't say your phone number so the courier can call you in case there is one... the problem is the fault of the company that ships the packages. You can't find an email or phone number to talk to a human.

USPS can lose a package easier than anyone I know. My package has been sitting in one spot six days and customer service is a JOKE! Seller said he would reship items but it is not his fault. If a business relied exclusively on USPS for deliveries, they could easily go out of business. Apparently USPS never reads their reviews or they just don't care. No wonder they lost 9.5 billion dollars last year.

Truth is Stranger Than Fiction
What a public embarrassment.

Here is the latest gem: I sent a certified letter to be delivered nine blocks away in the same zip code on 26 Jan 26. As of today, 06 Feb, 26, it's not updated in the system or delivered. I made a ticket complaint and here is the response from USPS Customer Service, our Post Office:

"I have attempted to contact our counterparts in ******** both by email and phone; however, I have unfortunately been unable to reach them."

My response was to send them a letter.

Falsely marking tracked mail orders as delivered
USPS is falsely marking tracked shipments as delivered. This is beyond frustrating to me because I lose all consumer protection provided by the company where I made the purchase. USPS is routinely doing this. Usually the package shows up the next day. On January 29th they classified my tracked mail as delivered, but that wasn’t true until Feb 2nd. And I have an EBay order that was marked delivered on February 2nd that is still missing. It’s February 6th. I don’t think I can just tell EBay “the post office is lying.”

TERRIBLE
TERRIBLE, TERRIBL, TERRIBLE!! Do not waste your money using the USPO. I have lost more money in a single holiday season shipping air than every before. Paid for air shipping and packages did not get to customer for 7 days. Customers have written negative reviews regarding my shipping and the shipping was not my fault. I had to return money on varies purchases due to the USPO failure to get my air shipments to customers on time!! I have lost a lot of money and no one has ever done a thing. I have called customer service, written the local post master, as well as the post master in Washington, DC. To date, they have done nothing!. They just don't give a damn about your packages. PERIOD!

If I can give 0 star I will. It seems they does not know what they are doing. They keep sending my package to Nashville tn to Knoxville tn then send back to Nashville tn. It's been 1 week delay now. Still did not recieve it yet. Terrible experience. They need to know how to read the address.

MIS-SHIP AGAIN !! I shipped a package up the East Coast from North Carolina to Connecticut...It ended up stuck in Sacramento, CA. for 10 days !! NOW, and expecting package made it within 6 miles of my home BEFORE being MIS-SHIPPED 60 miles away. AND USPS wants rate increases.

Somewhere between lost and found.
Package came to my hometown post office ,then instead of delivering it, it was shipped 159 miles away to another post office. Now it's making its way back through the system. No wonder they are losing money. Are they lazy or just stupid?
USPS sucks. They’ve shown in town for two days. Still not delivered.

They need to fire everyone involved in this inept money pit. Terrible service which hires anyone with a pulse. There are however good employees. They need to start internally weeding out the inept and incompetent employees. Whatever happened to their creed??

WHere is my order?
I placed an order 1-22-2025, shipped but was delayed, not know reason or expectd deliver date, no answer for reason from USPS, yet out$$$$, So much for two day delivery its been over two weeks and have no idea if i will even get package. Ship FEDEX if you actually need something shipped on time.

Slow and lazy

So unbelievable bad, incompetent and error riddled that I think it must be by design. I've lived in 2 so-called third-world countries whose respective postal services make USPS look like they are being single-handedly operated by Mr. Bean.

Absolutely terrible. Have had MULTIPLE packages be delayed or ruined. Especially with express mail, and had no compensation for paying that extra fee to get my package in time. Nearly two months ago I had ordered a package of hatching eggs. They kept them for over a week in an Arizona facility. They were spoiled when they arrived. I message them to get my money pack with they promise is ‘covered’. Had waited three weeks for a response on my initial file. They asked for details, I gave them the detailed, and have now been waiting for over a month with no response. Had similar experiences with live animals deliveries. What an absolute let down of a company. Will not be using again.

Packages NEVER come on time. EVER. Honestly don't even know how the BBB hasn't taken them down for false advertising. Package needs a signature, tried calling and got hung up on TWICE. Tied too change to pick ups in store to no avail. EFF UPS SERIOUSLY I NEED THIS PACKAGE

My experience with UPS has been HORRIBLE. Getting accurate information for the delivery date was near impossible after I paid to have the day switched. The fellow who delivered my package dropped it on the snow in front of my garage. He refused to bring it into the house saying it was too heavy. I then picked it up myself and instructed hit to pick up the other end. He left his end on the steps in front of my house. I was able to bring the package inside. The exterior of my package was filthy. The delivery guy was a pig and rude !!!!
My package has been delayed for over a week , the drivers are LAZY. They make all excuses for the drivers which is unacceptable.

Had to chase delivery information via email and then tracking. Was advised delivery address cannot be accessed due to "security code" missing. No such security exists, if driver did call to the house, he didn't leave a card. Tried to change delivery address online, as"guest login". Doesn't work. Customer "service" is a chat bot, running round in circles. Terrible system, catastrophic service. Can't speak to an agent, no option.

No matter when i get a package delivered by ups, they always deliver it late or dont use my buildings buzzer. when ever i get the choice to choose delivery companys i will go out of my way to pay more, just to avoid ups

Use anyone else but UPS. I have never had such a bad experience. My package has been lost twice delayed 5x and I still have no clue where its at. I even contacted them and 3 days later still no response. I will never shop from anywhere else that only has UPS as a shipping option.

I would give negative stars if I could I’ll never use UPS again I ordered a package overseas 6 months ago never received the package but was still billed $105.30 and they make it so annoying to get the bill thrown out in the garbage where ups belongs that it was easier to just pay the bill i didn’t owe bunch of f-ing criminals at ups I’m disgusted .

Ordered 5 blinds for me new home that were shipped by UPS. Beware how your shipment may arrive. Absolutely bonkers courier service by UPS. 1 blind deposited at a UPS collection location at 1pm today. 4 other blinds part the same shipment left in the rain in my garden at 230pm. Got home 4hrs later to 4 saturated boxes with my new blinds inside. And I now have the customer first inconvenience of picking up the blind deposited at a local Londis or wait 48hrs for redelivery. Lovely thanks UPS you don't live up to all of your values "Customer First, People Led, and Innovation Driven, aiming to deliver, connect, and empower."

This delivery company is the absolute worst!!!!! They lied and still have my package for over a week!!!! They will not allow me to pic it up, they will not tell the truth about where my package actually is!!! The definitely stole my stuff!! I’m so over this. They need to be out of business ASAP

UPS customer service doesn’t give a shit about you. This is in reference to a prescription order shipped through UPS for my chemotherapy medicine. My order was received at the Chelmsford Massachusetts UPS hub on January 29. This order status did non-update throughout the following weekend and still has not updated. I called customer service and was told that the order is lost. No one did anything other than look at the status that I could see. I informed the customer service rep that this is a critical medication and I needed it ASAP. I was told that I needed to contact the shipper so they can submit a claim. No one was willing to ask any further questions reach out to other departments or make any phone calls. I felt like my issue did not matter to the customer service rep, especially when this is such a critical medication that I am now delayed on starting. The company that shipped it for me has already started working on a replacement hopefully UPS will have their shit together with this one and I’ll get it in a timely manner.

I am NOT the least bit interested in their double talk excuses and reasons. JUST DO BETTER. My package from Los Angeles to Sacramento, should NEVER have been routed to NEW JERSEY where it is still sitting going on 5 days. Sender and recipient are only 400 miles apart in the same state, yet the package took a

They will deliver to the wrong address and accept no responsibility
I was notified by email 2 days after my package was supposedly delivered and it wasn’t. When I checked the tracking, it showed that it was delivered to an unknown address in a different city. UPS accepted no responsibility for their negligence even though they clearly showed it was delivered to a different address. I’m very disappointed. I knew they were a bad company before, but this is ridiculous.

I wish I could post with a ZERO star!! They are a "trash" company!! I'm glad they are struggling to stay afloat!! I have "lack-Listed them from "EVER" delivering to me from "ANY STORES" I shop at!! In 2025 (am not too sure of the "exact date") summer time, there was a driver delivering to my neighbor & then to me on our "private drive." I have a Fruit tree that the branches hang over my fence. My neighbor & I were talking when she stopped and delivered my package, my telling her, the only reason I will permit you to deliver to this door is that I am out here to take it to the entrance (back door) where "any/all" deliveries go to. She was so nasty in her spirit, and when she got onto the truck, she turned the wheels into my fruit tree branches & smashed into them leaving some leaf's in the wiper blade, and my chain-link fence was "very close to being hit!!" The Unnecessary UPS Struggle
I will not speak to specific employees because each interaction that I have had with a human face-to-face has been pleasant...

I ordered some stuff online back in December. It was supposed to be delivered by the first week in January. I requested that it be held at one of the UPS "Access Points" since 1) it needed a signature and 2) I do not work at home. After paying the $5.99 fee to change the delivery location, the app said for MULTIPLE days that it would be delivered to that Access Point and on each day, the app updated to say that the store was closed. Each time, I would call the store and verify that they were and had been opened. The package ended up "damaged" and was sent back to the sender.

The package was resent and expedited since the sender knew that I had BEEN expecting it. I received a delivery window of 1:30 - 3:30 PM. There were no updates whatsoever...at 1:06 PM I get a notification from my doorbell/camera and see the UPS delivery person standing at my door ringing the doorbell. Moments later, another notification stating that they are unable to deliver the package...

UPS's system is extremely ineffective, dishonest, flawed, and manipulative. When I spoke to an agent about paying money to have the package rerouted, she would not agree to refund the money paid for services that were not followed through on. If I could avoid UPS, I would. Their customer service is all over the place and everyone seems to have either no idea or a different idea of what is going on with their company. They can't seem to deliver packages within the appropriate delivery window so that their customers don't have to go through the hassle of stressing about their items...just a horribly ran company through and through.

Note: the "date of experience" states today, however, this has been an ongoing battle since the first week of January....

UPS has been the worst courier experience I’ve had. I booked a pickup for a 7-package shipment in the Chicago area on January 5, 2026. Over the last five weeks, I have scheduled a pickup five times, and no driver has picked up the packages.

Each time, UPS updates the system saying the driver was “unable to pick up,” even though no one came. The pickup location is on a main road and easily accessible, not a remote area. It honestly feels like the pickup is being avoided because there are seven boxes.

I called customer service around 10 times. Every time I was told the issue was “escalated,” but nothing changed. If UPS cannot handle multi-box pickups, they should not allow customers to schedule them online.

Extremely unprofessional and no accountability.
Terrible service. Didn't deliver my package, claiming my house was a closed business. I was home all day. They must have delivered it to the wrong address. Completely unreliable.

Fast shipping from Italy to Cambodia (5 days), but for the last 4 days the package has been with UPS, who consider my address very far away (Siem Reap!) and will deliver it "tomorrow or the day after"... So I'm wasting my time waiting...

DHL use a grubby and intimidating debt recovery firm, Control Account, to intimidate people in dispute with DHL over payments for courier services. Control Account seek to add a huge admin fee to a late or disputed payment. They have no legal right to do so. DHL need to get a more reputable company to follow up late payments.

It's like they just don't want to deal with their job. Really dumb company with mutliple point of contact that are all unskilled and never talk to each others. Really unreliable. Sometimes has dishonest practices. Sometimes only speak in german, often has trouble providing copies of invoices. I asked my suppliers to never use DHL to ship anything to me.

Paid for 3 day express delivery under signature release, did my part, paid the tariffs quickly and on time. Package is out for delivery on the 3rd day, driver is about 10 miles away when he says "unable to deliver - no one was home". He was 10 miles away, how could he have attempted delivery? Even if, Lets say he had an invisible truck to come deliver my parcel, it was signature release, he should have left it at the gate, never using DHL again.

Could improve immensely knocking a door would get the attention of the person inside. PLEASE BEWARE! Do not use this company for shipping parcels. There customer service is designed to frustrate and complcate any claim you submit . Their drivers are untrustworthy and incompetent. Terrible. Never show up on time they say and today not at all on an urgent parcel required. Get no help online or by phone.

Waited 2 days for a parcel delivery, watched as the first day I was 111 in the queue, he got to around 80, second day I was 113, that person got to around 60-70, I realised at this rate the parcel was never getting to me. I then rerouted the parcel via a collection point, it took them 5 days to get it there, finally got the parcel and it had clearly been tampered with, the outside had a hole in it and the packaging around the item had been smashed at one end, no doubt to see what was inside. DHL is the worst service in the industry, by a country mile, we never have this problem with DPD, yet sellers insist on using these people. DO NOT TOUCH WITH A BARGEPOLE.

About as bad as a carrier can be. I really needed this item promptly: Day one - right towards the end of the suggested delivery window the tracking was updated to 'will deliver tomorrow as road was closed'. No road was closed - made up nonsense. Day two - needed the package even more now and, right towards the end of the suggested delivery window the tracking was updated to 'will deliver tomorrow, road traffic accident'. Unlike the closed road, I can't check on the legitimacy of that claim, but surely made up rubbish also. Decided to change the delivery location from my house to a local pick up point. When I went to pick it up from there the DHL software wasn't working and I had to wait ages for them to get it for me. They seem to have no interest in actually delivering the things they're being paid to deliver. In the old days a firm like this would have simply gone out of business. Not now - we'll put up with anything won't we?

if I had literally any other option…
Since the removal of de minimis and all the BS that comes with it, DHL is the only courier available for my goods from Japan. They charged me $130 to ship a 3 pound box of nothing but aluminum pins (small!) and I had to pay $60 in import fees. You’d think for the exorbitant costs they’d at least be fast, right? Wrong! My box reached my local hub 20 minutes from me on Friday but missed the truck. It now won’t be delivered until Monday. I know they’ve done Saturday deliveries in the past, or handed things off to USPS for Sundays! Why am I paying so much for such mediocre service?

Warning to anyone considering DHL for fast or reliable delivery.
I sent my house keys via DHL using a service advertised as 2–3 business days. Nearly two weeks later, the keys are still sitting in a DHL depot in Istanbul, undelivered.
The recipient was told to complete a customs form that DHL never sent. When the recipient went to the DHL depot in person to resolve this, DHL claimed they couldn’t help and told them to call instead.
I paid for the shipment and sent it while staying at my brother’s address in Denmark. I am now in the UK. Despite this, DHL refuses to speak to me, does not respond to my brother, and ignores the recipient’s correspondence as well.
To make matters worse:
The phone number listed on DHL’s website is not recognised
Online chat disconnected without taking any details or offering help
This has been one of the most unhelpful and frustrating customer service experiences I’ve had. If you need something delivered quickly, reliably, or with support when things go wrong, I strongly suggest looking elsewhere.
TEMU arrange a faster and more reliable service from China to anywhere. They respond to enquiries with upmost respect. DHL should send their staff to TEMU for training!
